title: Fremantle to rest Matthew Pavlich, Luke McPharlin, David Mundy against Port Adelaide
content:
Fremantle coach has announced several of their big-name players will miss the clash with Port Adelaide this weekend.

Matthew Pavlich, Luke McPharlin, Aaron Sandilands, David Mundy, Stephen Hill and Lee Spurr will be rested ahead of the minor premiers' finals campaign.

Lyon had signalled his intention to rest players after Sunday's win against Melbourne and the Dockers formally approached the AFL with their request on Monday.

Brownlow favourite Nat Fyfe was already set to miss the game through injury.
